thread.title: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team following air accident near Fort St. John, BC
thread.title_full: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team following air accident near Fort St. John, BC

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team following air accident near Fort St. John, BC
text:
Transportation Safety Board of Canada deploys team following air accident near Fort St. John, BC   
Oct 17, 2015   
EDMONTON, Canada - The Transportation Safety Board of Canada (TSB) is deploying a team following an accident involving a Cessna 207 near Fort St. John, British Columbia. The TSB will gather information and assess the occurrence. 
The TSB is an independent agency that investigates marine, pipeline, railway and aviation transportation occurrences. Its sole aim is the advancement of transportation safety. It is not the function of the Board to assign fault or determine civil or criminal liability.
